resources.string: *Please mark the toggles accordingly in order to notify eligibility for blood donation
I ensure that I don\'t have AIDS
I have not been tested positive for Hepatitis Virus
I have not consumed alcohol in the past 24 hours

string-array.name: eligibility_criteria
string-array.item: I ensure that I don\'t have AIDS
I have not been tested positive for Hepatitis Virus
I have not consumed alcohol in the past 24 hours
I don\'t suffer from Hyper Tension, Kidney Problems, Epilepsy, and Diabetes
I haven\'t been treated for Malaria within the last 3 months
I haven\'t undergone immunization within the last month
I haven\'t undergone any major dental procedure within the last month
